titles.title: A resolution recognizing Father's Day and the role of father engagement in improving the overall health and life outcomes for both the mother and baby.
A resolution recognizing Father's Day and the role of father engagement in improving the overall health and life outcomes for both the mother and baby.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: This resolution recognizes the important role of fathers and wishes all fathers and father figures a happy Father's Day.
